allow:
Bash(find cli -type f -name "*.go" -exec sed -i "
s/You have been signed out of Cline/You have been signed out of Beadsmith/g
s/signed in to Cline/signed in to Beadsmith/g
s/HandleChangeClineModel/HandleChangeBeadsmithModel/g
s/authenticated with Cline/authenticated with Beadsmith/g
s/Cline model selection/Beadsmith model selection/g
s/SelectClineModel/SelectBeadsmithModel/g
s/Configuring default Cline model/Configuring default Beadsmith model/g
s/SetDefaultClineModel/SetDefaultBeadsmithModel/g
s/Cline-authenticated/Beadsmith-authenticated/g
" {} ;)

Bash(copilot "Analyze this repository for production deployment readiness. Check: 1\) GitHub Actions workflow status 2\) Branch protection recommendations 3\) CI/CD configuration 4\) Open issues that might block release 5\) PR hygiene 6\) Release process maturity. Provide actionable recommendations.")

Bash(codex --full-auto "Fix the following security issues in this codebase:

1. In src/core/webview/WebviewProvider.ts, wrap the localhost:8097 dev script with an IS_DEV check so it only loads in development mode. Find the line with ''http://localhost:8097'' and wrap it with process.env.IS_DEV condition.

2. In webview-ui/src/components/common/MermaidBlock.tsx, change securityLevel from ''loose'' to ''strict'' to prevent XSS.

3. For the highlight function in webview-ui/src/components/history/HistoryView.tsx, ensure it escapes HTML entities before wrapping with span tags.

Make these changes now.")

Bash(codex --full-auto "Fix the Ralph loop bug in src/core/ralph/RalphLoopController.ts. 

The runSuccessCriteria method has TODO comments where test commands are logged but never executed. Instead, results are always set to true.

Implement actual command execution:
1. Import exec or spawn from child_process
2. Replace the TODO sections with actual command execution
3. Return true only if command exits with code 0
4. Use 60 second timeout for tests, 30 seconds for type check and lint
5. Follow the pattern used in src/core/beads/BeadManager.ts runTests method

Make these changes now.")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remaining unstaged changes from cline to beadsmith conversion

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: complete Cline to Beadsmith rebrand

Critical fixes:
- Fix proto conversion bug: BEADSMITH enum now returns "beadsmith" not "cline"
- Fix testing-platform imports: update @cline-grpc to @beadsmith-grpc
- Fix gRPC service names: cline.* to beadsmith.*

Documentation:
- Update docs.json with correct GitHub/Discord/Twitter links
- Update all page paths from cline-* to beadsmith-*
- Fix redirect destinations

Environment variables:
- Rename all CLINE_* to BEADSMITH_* \(breaking change for new app\)
- Update CLINE_DIR to BEADSMITH_DIR, default ~/.beadsmith

Skills and plans:
- Rename cline-extension to beadsmith-extension
- Update 10 plan files: cline-dag-* to beadsmith-dag-*
- Fix hook examples: cline/.clinerules to beadsmith/.beadsmithrules

Impact: Prevents silent provider resets, fixes broken imports, completes rebrand

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit --no-verify -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: complete Cline to Beadsmith rebrand

Critical fixes:
- Fix proto conversion bug: BEADSMITH enum now returns "beadsmith" not "cline"
- Fix testing-platform imports: update @cline-grpc to @beadsmith-grpc
- Fix gRPC service names: cline.* to beadsmith.*

Documentation:
- Update docs.json with correct GitHub/Discord/Twitter links
- Update all page paths from cline-* to beadsmith-*
- Fix redirect destinations

Environment variables:
- Rename all CLINE_* to BEADSMITH_* \(breaking change for new app\)
- Update CLINE_DIR to BEADSMITH_DIR, default ~/.beadsmith

Skills and plans:
- Rename cline-extension to beadsmith-extension
- Update 10 plan files: cline-dag-* to beadsmith-dag-*
- Fix hook examples: cline/.clinerules to beadsmith/.beadsmithrules

Impact: Prevents silent provider resets, fixes broken imports, completes rebrand

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
